description: Sri Lanka pacers Matheesha Pathirana and Dilshan Madushanka will miss August's three-match One-Day International (ODI) series against India due to injuries, ESPNcricinfo reported on Thursday. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Sri Lanka pacers Matheesha Pathirana and Dilshan Madushanka to miss India ODI series due to injuries
title_page: Sri Lanka pacers Matheesha Pathirana and Dilshan Madushanka to miss India ODI series due to injuries | The Straits Times
maintext:
Sri Lanka pacers Matheesha Pathirana and Dilshan Madushanka will miss August's three-match One-Day International (ODI) series against India due to injuries, ESPNcricinfo reported on Thursday.
Pathirana hurt his shoulder during Tuesday's third T20 international against India while Madushanka has a hamstring injury, adding to the hosts' fast bowling woes. Dushmantha Chameera and Nuwan Thushara are also out with illness and a fractured thumb.
Uncapped Mohamed Shiraz has been brought in as replacement, team manager Mahinda Halangoda told ESPNcricinfo.
Touring India swept the T20 series and will play three ODIs against the hosts on Aug. 2, 4 and 7. REUTERS
